rows.label: tev015001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Mondo if he has any useful info.

rows.label: tev015001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Mondo if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev015001_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Mondo about conditions during the enemy attack.

rows.label: tev015001_MSG0001
rows.name:
Do you know the waterfall on Biahno Lake?
Behind the falls is Headwater Cavern,
where you can find sanelac pearls.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG0002
rows.name: Er, that's all that I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG0008
rows.name: Lao and Saiden seem worried about Shingo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG0009
rows.name:
But when I look in Shingo's eyes, I see no hint of
misbehavior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm looking after him from afar, but if you share
their concern, you can go to the commercial district
to see for yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG0015
rows.name:
Under Lao's leadership, we were supposed to be
guarding that Skell they discovered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG0016
rows.name: It's not like Lao to abandon his post like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG0017
rows.name:
Lao always trusts that other teams can do their jobs
without help, and thus prioritizes his own mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG0018
rows.name:
But perhaps I am making too much of this.
Protecting the city is BLADE's number-one priority,
so in that sense, he arguably made the right choice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG1011
rows.name:
As I said, there is no reason to worry about Shingo.
Quite the contraryâ€”he is finally becoming a man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG1012
rows.name:
Starting a family... I wonder what Lao would think
about that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev015001_MSG1013
rows.name:
It would be nice if Shingo's example inspired him to
move forward himself.[ST:wait ]
